<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/filters/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a filter with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Filter ID","schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
